reviews.review: This weekend has been a dream come true for me...I am inspired, humbled & honored <3
If you’re not at @SassConf, you’re missing out on awesomeness with unicorn rainbow sprinkles on top. #SassConf
#sassconf was so awesome that it's making it really hard to adjust to normal life. Locked in mental loop for the next SassConf!
wow. #sassconf was incredible. what a friendly, open-minded, ego-free, and diverse group of speakers, attendees, organizers, maintainers.
@sassconf was a success. Best conference yet!!! Thanks to all the speakers & organizers.
Thank you SO MUCH @treehouse for sponsoring @SassConf & my ticket! I learned A LOT- can't wait to spread the word! Had an amazing experience
Loved putting real faces and personalities to all the people I've worked on GitHub issues with over the past year. @SassConf
Still reeling from such an awesome experience at @SassConf. Feel more inspired than I have in years.
